summary.para: The CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY structure contains an alternative name in one of a variety of name forms. These names are bound by a certification authority (CA) to a certificate's public key.
A structure can be CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY member of a structure.
Indicates the union variant used for the alternative name.
This can be one of the following values:

member.name: CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pOtherName
member.summary: A pointer to a CERT_OTHER_NAME structure, which includes an object identifier (OID) and a BLOB containing the name.

member.name: CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pwszRfc822Name
member.summary: Email address as a Unicode string.

member.name: CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pwszDNSName
member.summary: DNS name as an IA5 string.

member.name: CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DirectoryName
member.summary: A BLOB structure that contains a directory name.

member.name: CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.IPAddress
member.summary: Octet string that is an Internet Protocol address defined in accordance with Internet RFC 791.

member.name: CERT_ALT_NAME_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pszRegisteredID
member.summary: Object identifier (OID) of any registered object.
